text: Hi all, I'm trying to make a news-resource page for a website which will have dynamically updated content. I thought of making this through a blog, but the website already has one blog published with different content. Can this be through another blog ? If yes, then how do I access this other blog, without making it the default blog for that account ? Or will HubDB be a better approach for this ?
Here is one page that is not updating: <https://www.springsapartments.com/apartments/mn/savage/springs-at-egan-drive/>
